name: git-wizard
title: Git Wizard
description: Git Wizard is your personal assistant for crafting clean, consistent Git commits and pull requests. Built on best-practice templates, it helps you write clear messages, follow team conventions, and streamline your Git workflow—right from Raycast. Whether you're committing a quick fix or opening a detailed PR, Git Wizard makes it effortless and professional.
author: juanmartinlopeze

commands.name: commit
commands.title: Commit
commands.subtitle: Conventional commit
commands.description: Helps you craft clean, conventional Git commit messages quickly and with confidence.

commands.name: pull-request
commands.title: Pull Request
commands.subtitle: Structured Pull request
commands.description: PR Wizard helps you write professional, well-organized pull request messages by guiding you through key sections like summary, motivation, changes introduced, and issue reference — all formatted to match team standards.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
